title: NewsBreak - Trump Tweets that China Expected to Buy U.S. Agricultural Goods
text:
NewsBreak - Trump Tweets that China Expected to Buy U.S. Agricultural Goods

Economy 5 minutes ago (Sep 12, 2019 09:14AM ET)

© Reuters. Investing.com - China is expected to buy more agricultural goods, U.S. President Donald Trump tweeted on Thursday. • “It is expected that China will be buying large amounts of our agricultural products!” his tweet read. • The South China Morning Post reported on Wednesday that sources said officials were working on a trade agreement and the country is expected to buy more American agriculture products in hope of a better deal. • China is one of the top importers of U.S. agricultural goods, especially soybeans. • Some Chinese companies have begun price inquiries on U.S. agricultural goods in a sign that trade tensions between the two countries could be easing, Reuters reported.

NewsBreak - Trump Tweets that China Expected to Buy U.S. Agricultural Goods
